original_text: (There was none who sold himself to do what was evil in the sight of the Lord like Ahab, whom Jezebel his wife incited.
korean_text: 예로부터 아합과 같이 그 자신을 팔아 여호와 앞에서 악을 행한 자가 없음은 그를 그의 아내 이세벨이 충동하였음이라

sentences.original_text: There was none who sold himself
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 자신을 팔아 넘긴 자는 아무도 없었다

sentences.original_text: to do what was evil in the sight of the Lord
